entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
